betterquesting.name: Super Farm
betterquesting.desc: Another great Farming Tech is now within your reach.

betterquesting.name: Draconic Basics
betterquesting.desc: If you were lucky, you might step over some draconium dust in the UnderEnd. If that is true, there are some application of this dust you might consider interresting. Like Draconic Chest, which can automatically Input, Output, Filter and Smelt.

betterquesting.name: Big Reset
betterquesting.desc: When you are in so deep trouble that you need to use some of the cheats the second time, this reset is here for you.

betterquesting.name: Messa Island
betterquesting.desc:
NETHERRACK !!
Nether quartz [10-150]
Gold [5-35]
Lapis [5-25]
Silver [20-55]
Prometheum [2-45]

betterquesting.name: Gauss Rifle
betterquesting.desc: If you need better firepower, and you like the techno-approach, this may be the tool for you. It needs the Charging Station and rods to fire.

betterquesting.name: Empowering
betterquesting.desc: Some weird Energy Infusing machine is available now to you. Will it be useful? Maybe. YES of course. Check all the recipes it can do. You mus place 4 display stands around it 2 blocks away. Pump power into the stands.

betterquesting.name: Need electronics
betterquesting.desc: Casting and Rolling. Fun but not enough. It is time to start including some electronics. Do you know you can cast some most basic Electron Tubes on the Smeltery.

betterquesting.name: Armor Up
betterquesting.desc: Sooner or later you will need to do some fighting. Start getting ready for it by hardening some leather.

betterquesting.name: Electron maddness
betterquesting.desc: So they asked you to make some electron tubes but did not tell you how many? Really?

betterquesting.name: Launching Pad
betterquesting.desc: Space Ship Start need some infrastructure as well. You must construct a concrete based pad with controll tower next to it. This tower must be higher than your final rocket. You also must add a Rocket Assembling Machine, which will allow you to build your space ship.

betterquesting.name: Dark Steel Gear
betterquesting.desc: Did you noticed the strange new material Dark Steel? Do you know you can make Armor and Tools from it? Do you know that this armor can be Air Tight?

betterquesting.name: Materials
betterquesting.desc: Why spend time digging dirt? Would you like to buy some instead?

betterquesting.name: Ubgrading farms
betterquesting.desc: Tree farm can be ubgraded to any sort of farm, if you are up to it. Just use the soldering iron and some circuits.

betterquesting.name: Reset the Builders Chain
betterquesting.desc: If you liked this quest chain, you can do it once again for just a small fee.

betterquesting.name: Frames
betterquesting.desc: Tired of manual crafting? There is also autocrafting for poor you know? They are called Supercrafting frames and they are cheap.

betterquesting.name: Clay and Bucket
betterquesting.desc: Not enough clay? Try to use the receipt with Water Bowl, Dirt and Leaves. And when we are talking about Water Bown, do you know that you can make a simple Bucket out of Clay?

betterquesting.name: Don't try Nether/End
betterquesting.desc: Nether and End works differently then you are used to. So just please don't try to go there without my guidence. The attempt to open a portal will probably be fatal.

betterquesting.name: Machine Parts
betterquesting.desc: Maybe even some full machine parts are on sale today.

betterquesting.name: Laser Reconstruction
betterquesting.desc: With the Atomic Reconstructor a whole new world opens for you. Build one and explore it's capabilities.

betterquesting.name: Plates are not that easy
betterquesting.desc: Plates are more tricky. To cast a plate you first have to have a plate. Now, you can build a Small Plate Press, or basic Rolling Machine to get one. Or... if you have enough lead, lead is soft enough that you can hammer a plate out of it.

betterquesting.name: LavaWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
Closest planet to the Sun, Very Hot and Hostile.

Needs Lava World Orb

Small deposits of Redstone, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Eezo and Dilithium

Large deposits of Iron, Gold, Lead, Eezo, Basalt, Silver and Carmesine

Also Meteorite, Apatite, Titanium and Osram

Neherrack, Tiberium, Cobalt, Ardite and Nether Quartz

betterquesting.name: Most Needed
betterquesting.desc: Are you in need of some oxygen? Or hydrogen? Or energy?

betterquesting.name: The Sand Moon
betterquesting.desc: Your next stop should be the Red Sand Moon, orbiting the Blue Gas Giant. To get there, you need the Mystical World Orb. There is also the End Moon, but don't try to go there, before you will establish your base of operations on the Sand Moon.

betterquesting.name: Tranzistors
betterquesting.desc: Your first Advanced Circuits should be invested into making Crystalizer, which can produce Tranzistors and Microchips. Sure, you will have to look for some resources first, like Prometheum, but it is worth the effort, beleive me.

betterquesting.name: Zombies
betterquesting.desc:
You didn't think it will be just... Here you are, take it and go, did you? Well, to earn your entance to the market, you must entertain the audience first.

In this case by killing Zombies.

betterquesting.name: Initial Warnings
betterquesting.desc:
SOME WARNINGS for a new contestant:

1) STAY OUT OF WATER !! Piranha are BAD !!
2) Build a Bed/Sleeping bag, this is ZOMBIE territory
3) Sleep through nights
4) Focus on food variety

Try reading the GuideBook. It contains a lot of useful information.

betterquesting.name: Space Suit Gadgets
betterquesting.desc: Do you want your space suit to be more than just basic cloth bubble of oxygen? Add some gadgets to it.

betterquesting.name: Beeing issue
betterquesting.desc: Well, come bees can give you hell. But if you want... at least the worst... you can buy.

betterquesting.name: Feast Madness
betterquesting.desc: Overeating is no problem in minecraft.

betterquesting.name: Warp Drive
betterquesting.desc: The single most important part of your Space Ship is the Warp Drive. Build a Warp Core and place somewhere on your Ship a Warp Controller, the Helm of your Ship.

betterquesting.name: Over the Abyss
betterquesting.desc: They say you can get almost infinite ammount of abyssum down there. Can you?

betterquesting.name: Med Kit
betterquesting.desc: Small thing that may help you in your effort. If you start liquify some meat in Protein Liquifier, you may pump it into the Bottling Machine and start producing MedKits. Isn't it great?

betterquesting.name: Lemons!!!
betterquesting.desc: Why would anyone want to cheat in lemons? Does it make any sense?

betterquesting.name: Emergency Reset
betterquesting.desc: Something went wrong? This should fix it. Normally use the reset on the right.

betterquesting.name: Bricks
betterquesting.desc: If you mean it, you must know how to make bricks.

betterquesting.name: Coffee
betterquesting.desc: You were without a proper coffee long enough. It looks like, now the real game starts.

betterquesting.name: Desert Islands
betterquesting.desc:
Saltpeter [50-80]
Redstone [0-16]
Emerald [40-130]
Diamond [5-25]

betterquesting.name: Serious Bee
betterquesting.desc: Believe me, you will need them in one point.

betterquesting.name: Enchanting with Style
betterquesting.desc: You may be tired of random enchants. There is a better way with the new great Ender IO Enchanter.

betterquesting.name: Seeds
betterquesting.desc: Are you missing some seeds? We have some available. Come and pick.

betterquesting.name: Crush and Smelt
betterquesting.desc: The big sturdy Grinder can be now replaced by a much more compact Crusher. If you want. Also Powered Furnace is now available. Also some other utilities, droppers, placers and breakers are now on.

betterquesting.name: Orchard Madness
betterquesting.desc: If you want to take it seriously, you can start selling fruits.

betterquesting.name: Zombie Power
betterquesting.desc: With Dilithium, you may try to push zombies to power your stuff. Only if you would have a good source of nutrient distillation.

betterquesting.name: Furniture 1
betterquesting.desc: Four walls, roof and floor is what makes house. Furniture is what makes home.

betterquesting.name: Cherry Time
betterquesting.desc: First supply requires some cherry fruits.

betterquesting.name: Solar Power
betterquesting.desc: New Techs can also be used to improve your Solar Panels.

betterquesting.name: Apiary Upgrades
betterquesting.desc: Your Apiaries can be equipped with some pretty useful upgrades. Now you have the means to build those.

betterquesting.name: Bee Cheating
betterquesting.desc: Some people just don't like waiting for genetics to happend. Well... if you are in this show for the 3rd time I don't blame you. Ok, here you are, but you owe me one.

betterquesting.name: Phantom Factory
betterquesting.desc: Your understanding of the technology now jumped from the realm of Perfect to the realm of Magical.

betterquesting.name: Poor Ores
betterquesting.desc: Look around and deliver some poor nickel ore and poor zinc ore.

betterquesting.name: Automatic Defences
betterquesting.desc: You now have tech base strong enough to build some Gun Turrets or Tesla Coils if you want.

betterquesting.name: Forrest Islands
betterquesting.desc:
Aluminium [40-120]
Tin [30-100]
Copper [30-120]

betterquesting.name: Light
betterquesting.desc: If you want to start venturing into the deep you will need light. That means torches. For that you will need Wax, Ropes, Wood and a little bit Coal or CharCoal.

betterquesting.name: Magma Master
betterquesting.desc: Sure you can get one tank full of lava, but, can you get 256 of them?

betterquesting.name: UnderEnd Ores
betterquesting.desc: There are several ores specific to the UnderEnd only. Collect some samples of Draconium, Abyssum, Palladium and Prosperity Shards.

betterquesting.name: Witches
betterquesting.desc: You can hunt for witches if you prefer them...

betterquesting.name: Refined Storage
betterquesting.desc: It looks like, you will be able to digitize your items and store them on some portable drives. But are you sure it isn't too early for such a leap forward in tech?

betterquesting.name: Space Elevator
betterquesting.desc: If you are tired of flying a rocket to your Space Ship and back to Surface, you may want to try to build a Space Elevator.

betterquesting.name: Swamp Island
betterquesting.desc:
Coal [0-120]
Redstone [0-16]
Tin [30-100]
Aluminium [40-120]
Iron [10-55]
Lead [15-40]

betterquesting.name: Expanding the station
betterquesting.desc:
Sure you didn't put on all the things. Now it is time to expand the station. Add there the Oxygen Scrubbers and Oxygen Producer so you will not need the Space Suit there any more.

This way... One by one you will add all the things to your Station-Ship that it will become your final, big, mobile base.

betterquesting.name: Advanced Teleporter
betterquesting.desc: There are no words to describe, what this thing can do. Just expect hordes and hordes of victims.

betterquesting.name: Deep Resonance
betterquesting.desc: You find from time to time this strange deep resonance ore. But what to do with it? Well, if I will tell you that it is a powersource capable of giving 10kRF/tick, will you be interrested? Now you have all you need to try it out.

betterquesting.name: Initial Warnings
betterquesting.desc:
Beware. Every quest in this chapter has certain time when it can be fulfilled. Like initial bunch. When you will acquire first duranite ore your time will be over and you will never be able to return to those quests.

Your reward will be victory points so you will be able to pick whatever you want for them on the market.

betterquesting.name: Ores which are everywhere
betterquesting.desc:
Coal [0 - 128]
Redstone [0-16]
Copper [30-120]
Iron[0-30]
Duranite[0-10]
Basalt[0-50]

Poor Iron[0-64]
Poor Gold[0-32]
Poor Copper[40-255]
Poor Tin[40-255]
Poor Lead[20-50]
Poor Silver[10-42]
Poor Nickel[30-60]
Poor Zink[20-60]

betterquesting.name: Crystal-Free
betterquesting.desc: So ok, you want more power but you don't want to wait for crystal to grow. All right, here is one decent for you.

betterquesting.name: Space Liquids
betterquesting.desc: There are some most needed liquids, like dilithium or rocket fuel... but also more advanced ones. If you have some spare dilithium... you can buy some of them.

betterquesting.name: Machine Components
betterquesting.desc: When the clock engine breaks and you need a quick replacement part, you come here.

betterquesting.name: Best Magic Tools
betterquesting.desc: Did you noticed that you may be able to build the Supremium Gear now?

betterquesting.name: Supreme Diver
betterquesting.desc: Are you really going to dive there? Just to get the fame?

betterquesting.name: Oak Wood Parts
betterquesting.desc: Wood and Stone, Stone And Wood. That is what you need for a good building.

betterquesting.name: Super Suit
betterquesting.desc: Armor, Shields, Gadgets, Tools... all in one package. Well it is an idea, so why not to try to make it real? Build your Suit Workstation.

betterquesting.name: Luxury Wood Parts
betterquesting.desc: To make things nice, you must add some colors and shades, right?

betterquesting.name: Heavy Tools
betterquesting.desc: Now you should have everything to be able to build Tool Forge and start with heavy tools like the Mining Hammer and Excavator.

betterquesting.name: Mining the Crystal Moon
betterquesting.desc: Did you noticed the strange little moon of the Alien Planet? You should explore it, t contains deposits of Black Quartz and some other crystal structures.

betterquesting.name: Telepads
betterquesting.desc: Teleporting. Nothing more, nothing less. You may be finally able to teleport. Isn't it great?

betterquesting.name: The Mooshroom World
betterquesting.desc: Your last destination is the Mooshroom Moon, orbiting the Gas Giant. The Only known source of Aurorium in this corner of the universe. To get there, you will need the Mooshroom World Orb.

betterquesting.name: Power Lasers
betterquesting.desc: The Laser transport system can be now modified to transfer also Power. And some more Power Related stuff is now available as well.

betterquesting.name: Loading and Unloading
betterquesting.desc: Optionally, you can add Ship Loader and Unloader and Fuel Loader and Unloader to automate your space ship handling.

betterquesting.name: Fusion Crafting
betterquesting.desc: Yet another powerful Energy Infusion crafting technique is now available to you.

betterquesting.name: Treated Wood
betterquesting.desc: Charcoal can be fired up in Coke Oven into Coal Coke. Byproduct is the Oil. Basic resource for all the engineering.

betterquesting.name: Experience Obelisk
betterquesting.desc: And also you can now improve your XP storing by constructing the Experience Obelisk.

betterquesting.name: Eezo
betterquesting.desc: To get anywhere with your electronics you will have to find a stable source of Eezo. Check the Roadmap guide to figure out where to find it. You will most probably have to get there.

betterquesting.name: RocksInSky Asteroid Belt
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the OceanWorld, so it requires the Ocean World Orb.

It is an Asteroid Belt, so beware of the landing hazard.

Deposits of Iron, Gold, Redstone, Lapis, Emeralds, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Titanium, Silver, Cobalt, Ardite, Nether Quartz and Prometheum.

betterquesting.name: Improved Beam Transfer
betterquesting.desc: Your power and Item transfering beams can now be upgraded too.

betterquesting.name: Wyvern Gear
betterquesting.desc: It may be possible that you discovered a way how to improve your gear with the power of a Wyvern.

betterquesting.name: Fluid Transporting
betterquesting.desc: Do you want to buy some basic fluid storage and transport?

betterquesting.name: Staff of Power
betterquesting.desc: Did you ever felt infinitely powerful? Try this little one.

betterquesting.name: Liquid Fuel Engine
betterquesting.desc: You also see a way to miniaturize the Liquid Fuel Engine. Build one.

betterquesting.name: Better Defeses
betterquesting.desc: Early Industrial age also brings some upgrades in weaponry and passive defences available to you. Try out Razor Wire, Engineers Workbench and Revolver.

betterquesting.name: Technical revolution
betterquesting.desc: Rods, Gears and Plates are base for every machine. First you can do is start casting some Rods and Gears, For that you need a form. Basic Stone Gear and Tough Stone Rod should be enough.

betterquesting.name: Sailing away
betterquesting.desc: Are you tired of your island? Do you want to find a better place to mine? Then build a ship and sail-on. You will need Steam Engine, Steering Wheel and some Floaters to make the ship going.

betterquesting.name: The Biggest Cheat
betterquesting.desc:
You understand that this is the BIGGEST POSSIBLE cheat and you should not use this if you are not in the DEEPEST DESPAIR, right?

Well, let's get over it so you can get back to your normal play.

betterquesting.name: Deploy and visit the Station
betterquesting.desc: To Deploy the Station, just put it into the same type of rocket, you are using for satellites. To visit the station, put in your rockets Guidance Computer the Station's ID Chip.

betterquesting.name: Presser
betterquesting.desc: This may give you some better food. So don't complain and use it. You didn't forget about the food situation, right?

betterquesting.name: Forestry Machines
betterquesting.desc: Our viewers love watching you... you can pick your reward for their happiness.

betterquesting.name: Sorting, Sort of
betterquesting.desc: Keeping your stuff sorted is a huge issue, I grant you that. Well, drawers can help you with that if you will make the Controller for them.

betterquesting.name: Heaven and Hell
betterquesting.desc: If you reached SandMoon, which is orbiting MysticalWorld Blue Giant, you can go on and finally visit the Nether and the End. Portal to the nether is unlocked by crafting Uranium Seed. Shape and igniter are unchanged, Obsidian 2*3, FlintandSteel. The End has no portal. Just point there your rocket and pray.

betterquesting.name: Magic Tools
betterquesting.desc: Mystical agriculture gives you also access to new levels of tools, weapons and armor. Inferium and Prudentium armor should be now in your reach. They can be also later on changed to Air Tight - space capable versions.

betterquesting.name: Data Transfer
betterquesting.desc: Is your sattelite network too slow? Buy the data from us and you will be done in notime. Well of course it costs something, but you are used to that.

betterquesting.name: The Vat
betterquesting.desc: You have now much efficient way to process some liquids. The new machine is called The Vat. Build it.

betterquesting.name: Regular Ores
betterquesting.desc: Let's increase the load. We want to see some real Digging.

betterquesting.name: Asteroid Belt
betterquesting.desc:
Belt is the second Moon of your HomeWorld Giant. But before you go there here is small warning. It is an Asteroid Belt. It can easily happen, that your rocket will not hit any land and just disappear into the space. But sooner or later, you will have to go there anyway. So Good Luck.

And Deposites: Iron, Gold, Redstone, Lapis, Diamond, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Basalt, Titanium, Silver.

Also Cobalt, Ardite and Nether Quartz.

betterquesting.name: Was in space
betterquesting.desc: Congrats, you did the biggest step. You don't know that yet, but space is much more dangerous than ocean. That is why we open here for you a whole new chapter of safelines.

betterquesting.name: Draconic Teleporter
betterquesting.desc: Teleporters and Teleporting Gates? Are we this far?

betterquesting.name: World Orb
betterquesting.desc:
The trial run of your Ship should go to the orbit of the Red Gas Giant itself. It is a super-short jump, so you will not have to put many Dilithium Crystals (the white ones) into the Warp Core.

But you will have to put the correct World Orb into the Warp Controller. in this case it is the Homeworld World Orb.

betterquesting.name: Planets and The Goal
betterquesting.desc: To complete this modpack (if you need a final task for a sandbox game) you must build your spaceship and reach the Haven, moon orbiting the Gas Giant in the Beta Star System. Terraform this moon and build there your Victory Monument. Using a lot of expensive reources... Let's say Violium, Astrium and Awakend Draconium, using Golden Player Heads as decorations.

betterquesting.name: Chefs Meals
betterquesting.desc: After the fingerfoods time for some real meal.

betterquesting.name: Better Processing
betterquesting.desc: Smeltery is a great approach but by grinding the ore using the Crusher, you can gain even more. Even better is to stop casting rods, gears and plates and start pressing them with Metal Press. Go ahead and try those out.

betterquesting.name: Powering Up
betterquesting.desc: Need some more power gadgets?

betterquesting.name: Plant Power
betterquesting.desc: Some new power generation options are now available. Canola Oil Generator and Bio Generator.

betterquesting.name: Liqor Delivery
betterquesting.desc: For what somebody wants crates full of plums is NOT a mystery.

betterquesting.name: Winning the Race
betterquesting.desc: Next to the Mooshroom Moon is a small rock called the Haven. Your final goal is to Terraform this rock and build there a Monument of Victory, using at least 1000 blocks of Violium, 1000 blocks of Astrium and 1000 blocks of Awakened Draconium. In the heart of the shrine must be displayed at least one Golden Player Head.

betterquesting.name: Dimensional Transciever
betterquesting.desc: What about sending your items across the dimensions? Do you want something like that?

betterquesting.name: End Crystal
betterquesting.desc: Here is also one alternative... it is almost cheap, right?

betterquesting.name: Space Fuel
betterquesting.desc:
So you have some crude oil to run your diesel generators. Well that is not enough to get you into space. You know how to make a proper Rocket Fuel, but for that you need a proper Chemical Reactor and that is something you can not build just yet.

So here is an alternative road. Using Industrial Mixer and Forestry Fermenter, you can get a fluid powerful enough that you can turn it into Rocket Fuel in the basic Industrial Refinery.

It is expensive but doable.

betterquesting.name: To Lava Planet
betterquesting.desc: So it is finally here. Using resources from the gas giant, build the Lava World Orb and travel to your first distant planet.

betterquesting.name: End Trophy
betterquesting.desc: It takes guts to kill the Dragon, right? But for this time, you can skip it.

betterquesting.name: Moar Time
betterquesting.desc: Oxygen is runnig out, and no base near by. Really deep trouble, isn't it. But you don't want just to run Home... here you have your second chance if you want it.

betterquesting.name: Draconium Gear
betterquesting.desc: Using resources from this Hot World... You may be able of producing the Awakened Draconium Tools and Armor... and maybe go back and defeat the Chaos Guardian?

betterquesting.name: Ultimate Mob Farm
betterquesting.desc: There are no words to describe, what this thing can do. Just expect hordes and hordes of victims.

betterquesting.name: DistantWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
It requires the Distant World Orb or Gateway through the Nether

Small deposites of Iron, Redstone, Lapis, Zinc, Nickel and Basalt.

Large deposits of Gold, Diamonds, Emeralds, Lead, Eezo, Osram, Silver, SoulSand an Uranium.

Also Coal, Dilithium, Jauxum, Magma, Netherrak and Valyrium.

betterquesting.name: Computers
betterquesting.desc: Some people will always think that computer is just a toy. They cannot be more wrong. This modpack comes with handy manual and example floppy discs. You can use the computers doing work for you without writing a single line of code. How? Just craft the Computer Manual, it will show you everything in few simple steps.

betterquesting.name: Furnace
betterquesting.desc: How to tame the flames? Yes you can. Just don't think that you don't have to sleep any more. Dry Dirt on drying rack, use the bricks to make a Furnace.

betterquesting.name: The Red Gas Giant
betterquesting.desc: If you used the Orb the right way, you should be now in the orbit of your Red Gas Giant. Your next mission is to harvest some Nitrogen out of it. Harvesting Gas Giants is a good way for obtaining specific liquids. Start by building an Unmanned Vehicle Assembler.

betterquesting.name: To the Moon
betterquesting.desc:
You have space suit, launch pad and rocket fuel. What next? Well, build the damned rocket. For your first mission to the Moon, you will need just a simple rocket. With Basic Rocket Engines, Some Fuel Tanks, one Guidance Computer and a Seat. I also recommend to add some storing options like Storage Crates.

Build the rocket on the platform and link it with the Assembler using the Linker. Scan the rocket and if everything is green, build it. Fuel it up, sit into the chair and set the Moon as your destination. Don't forget your Space Suit. Don't forget enough material to refuel the rocket for your journey back. Don't forget your mining tools. Spare Oxygen and Gas Charge Pad.

And Blast Off.

Beware that this is not some childs play so forget 1engine with one tank and your seat on top of it. Our test rocket needed 7 engines and 30 tanks to be able to lift you up. Oh... you will also need a Planet ID Chip in your on board computer.

betterquesting.name: Wanna go Home
betterquesting.desc:
If you are really, really stuck. Wherever you are. You may want this one-time teleport to get back home.

Yes, you are looser, BUT think about how much viewers you pulled when you were getting into this situation.

betterquesting.name: Age of Plants
betterquesting.desc: Last chance to prove how good you are in mining... Next time, you will probably grow metals. So your next milestone is the

betterquesting.name: Why UnderEnd
betterquesting.desc: Some wild stories are here about the mystical world of UnderEnd. Huge Cave full of dangerous enemies. Well, why in the world would you ever want to go there? I have here a simple answer. Palladium. You need palladium to make Niob which is a basic component for every higher electronic component. So, your next goal is the UnderEnd.

betterquesting.name: Wither Killer
betterquesting.desc: So, it is now or never... CAN - YOU - DO - IT ?

betterquesting.name: To Alien Planet
betterquesting.desc: As you may know, Lava Planet is the best known deposit of Tiberium in this star system. Also Dilithium and Titan deposits are here. Start a mine, harvest the ores and use them to make the Alien World Orb, the key to the next planet in the row.

betterquesting.name: Are you Miner?
betterquesting.desc: You must first prove that you are a serious miner. Deliver 10 flint pickaxe heads to prove it.

betterquesting.name: Spawning on Demand
betterquesting.desc: You also know about a very powerful Spawning system you may be able to reproduce now. Also some monster Attractors and Repulsors should be now in your reach.

betterquesting.name: Getting Soulsand
betterquesting.desc: To build the UnderEnd portal, you will need some soulsand. Unfortunately the only place where you can find some here on this got-forgotten planet is down in the depths of the Roguelike Dungeons, which can be found in the countryside from time to time. Don't worry, you will not miss them. Huge, tower-like buildings with a suspiciously looking staircase in their middle.

betterquesting.name: Automatic Bees
betterquesting.desc: Bees now can be easily automated building Alvearies, you know? You even don't need to breed them to Industrious any more.

betterquesting.name: Inventory Panel
betterquesting.desc: It seems possible now to build a much improved distributed storing system. If you want to try it out.

betterquesting.name: Celestial Manipulator
betterquesting.desc: Let be day. You might know a way to move the stars now... maybe.

betterquesting.name: OceanWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
It requires the Ocean World Orb

Small Deposites of Gold, Diamonds, Emeralds, Zinc, Lead, Nickel, Eezo and Silver.

Large deposites of Iron, Redstone, Lapis, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Osram, Basalt and Duranite.

Also Coal, Ovium, Vibranium, Iridium and Titanium.

betterquesting.name: Zealous Farmer
betterquesting.desc: Who says you cannot have chests full of Eggplants?

betterquesting.name: Solar Power
betterquesting.desc: There is no water or air flow in the space so how to produce a free power? Well, maybe you are far enough for your first Solar Generator. Try to build one.

betterquesting.name: Proper Advanced Circuits
betterquesting.desc: You must realize by now that there sure is a better way to make those tedious Circuits. Well, there is. You must build a machine, called Precision Assembler and you will be green to go.

betterquesting.name: Basalt
betterquesting.desc: There are two variants of basalt on this world. Deliver both to please the viewers.

betterquesting.name: Your Home
betterquesting.desc:
Your home is a moon orbiting the HomeWorld gas giant, 3rd planet of the star A. I call this moon Home. Speciality of the Home is that it is an Ocean moon with a lot of islands. Another speciality is that it's mineral deposits are spreaded based on the biome, which dominates each island.

Meaning find a tropical island and it will have different ores underneath than a desert island. For your ease, I will give you here list of know island types and their ores so you don't have to just guess. A pro po, Boats are disabled and Ocean is full of player-eating piranha. Build yourself a Ship or AirShip.

betterquesting.name: Master Caster
betterquesting.desc: You don't plan to do this by your own hands... I hope.

betterquesting.name: Going Exotic
betterquesting.desc: Some unique and precious metals should buy our attention.

betterquesting.name: Drawers
betterquesting.desc: What about some alternative to the oh so boring chests? Maybe Storage Drawers?

betterquesting.name: The End Asteroid Belt
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the Mystical Gas Giant, so it requires the Mystical World Orb

Large deposit of draconium, Chaos shards. Beware, Chaos Guardian Included.

betterquesting.name: The Ocean World
betterquesting.desc: Your next destination is the Ocean World. To get there, you will need the Ocean World Orb.

betterquesting.name: Reset the Market
betterquesting.desc: Close the market and set it up for another business day?

betterquesting.name: Are you Farmer?
betterquesting.desc: You must first prove that you are a serious farmer. Deliver 30 waterbowls and I will believe you.

betterquesting.name: Distributing
betterquesting.desc: Now you have some automation and mechanical components. By icluding Item Routers, you can start building your first distribution system.

betterquesting.name: Fruits
betterquesting.desc: And when you look up instead of down, you want to see great trees with wonderfull fruits.

betterquesting.name: Age of Steel
betterquesting.desc: So you are now having Steel. This certainly improves your hoarding chances. Next mile for you is Soul Sand. Finish your hoarding quests in time buddy.

betterquesting.name: Furniture 2
betterquesting.desc: Well, there is furniture and then there is luxus.

betterquesting.name: Magic Seeds
betterquesting.desc: Mystical agriculture gives you opportunity to grow ores. At first, Wood, Dirt, Stone or Water... but later on all Metals and other useful stuff. What you need is Prosperity Ore, which can be found in the UnderEnd. Also, Mystical plants can be harvested by forestry farm, if you will set it on crop.

betterquesting.name: Star System A
betterquesting.desc: Now you have a Warp Ship which can go nowhere. Well. For your ship to be able to warp, you must put correct WorldOrb into the Warp Controller. I will give you here the list of Planets with their resources and required Orbs. Figure it out yourself. Small hint. Your final goal in StarSystem A is to get to the Blue Giant MysticalWorld.

betterquesting.name: Reset the Market
betterquesting.desc: Close the market and set it up for another business day?

betterquesting.name: Storage Crates
betterquesting.desc: You need to pile up your things even more. Especially now when you are getting harvests. Storage Crates are a good solution for you.

betterquesting.name: Orbital Mining
betterquesting.desc: It can be this easy. Aim your beam to a planet, fire and get the resources. Try it out.

betterquesting.name: Reset the Orchard Chain
betterquesting.desc: If you liked this quest chain, you can do it once again for just a small fee.

betterquesting.name: Automation
betterquesting.desc: With the access to basic metals, you may want to start making your first factory. Do you know that you can build a timer for example with a conveyor belt?

betterquesting.name: Terraforming
betterquesting.desc: Advanced Rocketry Terraformer is a tool for planetary artists. Are you one of them?

betterquesting.name: Deep Dusts
betterquesting.desc: Can you go deeper and get some Redstone and Duranium dusts?

betterquesting.name: Flint
betterquesting.desc: For now, you have only the old fashion way to get flint. Break a block of Gravel and you have a chance.

betterquesting.name: Mining Asteroids
betterquesting.desc:
Another way how to get some resources is to launch asteroid mining mission. Following ores can be gathered.

Iron, Gold, Redstone, Lapis, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Silver, Nickel, Eezo, Osram, Basalt, Dilithium and Meteorite.

betterquesting.name: Trading in Space
betterquesting.desc: So you decided to get into space. That is brave and our market is here to support your effort.

betterquesting.name: Early Crystal
betterquesting.desc: Ok, I still think the new way is much more fun... but if you insist, here you are.

betterquesting.name: Smeltery
betterquesting.desc: Time to put that Charcoal into good use. Build a smeltery, it can not doule your ores, but it will give you more than a plain furnace. Well... with basin for now only.

betterquesting.name: MushroomWorld Moon
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the BlueBall Gas Giant. But it is so important that the World Orb is named by this world, not the Planet. Mushroom World Orb.

Deposits of Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Redstone, Lapis, Nickel, Eezo, Osram, Basalt, Black Quartz, Jauxum, Uru and Aurorium can be found here.

betterquesting.name: Collecting Victory Points
betterquesting.desc: There are multiple ways you can please our viewers. During your journey you will be given several opportunities. Each will be rewarded with victory points. You can exchange those victory points later for material or food or you can just pile them up to prove your viewers that you are the best player they ever saw.

betterquesting.name: Bee Genome
betterquesting.desc: Really? Genes? You might be able to improve your bees immensely with this. So why not try it?

betterquesting.name: Tinkers Tools
betterquesting.desc: So you probably survived the first night. By punching wood and leaves. But that is enough. Now it is time to make some tools.

betterquesting.name: Automatic Defense
betterquesting.desc: Did you heard of Punji Sticks? That is an old and simple way how to get rid of the zombies, you know? You will dig a pit and plant there some sharpened reed.

betterquesting.name: No quests mandatory
betterquesting.desc: Some people just don't like quests. Fair enough, I want this to be pure joy (or suffering what ever you prefer) even for you. That is why the most important information is pulled out of the common questline and put here. So you can read it and play even without the other quests.

betterquesting.name: Taiga Island
betterquesting.desc:
Osram [0-10]
Zinc [30-40]
Aluminium [40-120]
Gold [5-35]
Diamond [5-25]

betterquesting.name: Chef of the year
betterquesting.desc: With professional kitchen, and enough imagination... you can get much more profit then just with selling basic resources.

betterquesting.name: Leaving your Home
betterquesting.desc: So you can go into space... what now? Well Now you need to teach your ship to WARP. For that you will need to visit the other moons of your HomeWorld Gas Giant and start Asteroid Mining missions. I will make it easier for you by giving here some hints for each of those.

betterquesting.name: No Random Mutations
betterquesting.desc: The Mutatron you used for the bees can be upgraded into the advanced version. No more randomness is necessary.

betterquesting.name: Building your Warp Ship
betterquesting.desc:
The next step is to build a Warp Ship, because all the other materials you need are not in this Gas Giant's vicinity. Start by building a launch pad similar to the one you have for your ship, but larger. Place Space Station Assembling Machine next to it instead of the Rocket Assembling Machine.

Build the core of your space station on this platform. Your first rocket flying to your space station will land on this platform, so be careful with the design. Also you may want to put there a Landing Pad which will tells your rocket, where to land exactly.

To pack the station, put in the Assembler a Space Station ID chip and a Satellite Bay.

betterquesting.name: Blink
betterquesting.desc: It looks like some early teleportation is also available to you now.

betterquesting.name: Zombie Hunter
betterquesting.desc: Well hunting zombies is great and all but this? You had to do this on purpose.

betterquesting.name: Magical Flowers
betterquesting.desc: So you can make a flower which will produce blaze powder for you. Interesting. Now I am intrigued to find out what other flowers you can make.

betterquesting.name: Conduits
betterquesting.desc: Micro Conduits for Redstone Signal, Power, Fluids and even Items are now available to you.

betterquesting.name: Liquid Handling
betterquesting.desc: Semi Automatic tank, capable of pulling and pushing the liquids from adjescent machines. This is a dream come true.

betterquesting.name: Chiseled Decorations
betterquesting.desc: It is time to add some fanciness to this world.

betterquesting.name: Lava Walker
betterquesting.desc: You should try to explore the Underend a little bit. There are many nice places there.

betterquesting.name: MicroWave Power
betterquesting.desc:
If you are tired of building a Power Plant on every planet you go, there is a solution. Build a network of Solar Satellites and MicroWave Receiver in your base. And voila, you have a portable power source.

If you launch those satellites from Homeworld, will you be able to catch their transmission also on the Moon? Yes. Or on the Lava World? Probably not.

betterquesting.name: Casting Table
betterquesting.desc: Before you start doing anything industry-like you will have to upgrade your smeltery with casting basin. Did you noticed that you need duranite for that? Look for it near the bedrock.

betterquesting.name: Vegetables
betterquesting.desc: So you can collect roots, Can you also collect vegetables?

betterquesting.name: Iceberg Island
betterquesting.desc:
Gold [5-35]
Lead [15-40]
Osram [0-10]
Silver [20-55]

betterquesting.name: Better Capacitor
betterquesting.desc: With new materials, you can now build much better capacitors.

betterquesting.name: AlienWorld Planet
betterquesting.desc:
Almost pleasant world.

Needs Alien World Orb

Small deposits of Iron, Gold, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Lead, Eezo, Osram and Silver

Large deposits of Redstone, Lapis, Diamonds, Emeralds, Aluminium, Zinc, Nickel, Basalt, Karmesine and Duranite.

Some Coal, Ovium and Draconium. Meteorite, Apatite, Iridium and Osram.

betterquesting.name: Prepper
betterquesting.desc: They say you are getting ready for the bad time. What do you expect... a zombie appocalypse?

betterquesting.name: Luck for everybody
betterquesting.desc: And you thought those rabbit foots will be worthless. Well, from today on, probably yes.

betterquesting.name: Star System B
betterquesting.desc: The gate into star system B is the DistantWorld planet. You can get there through its WorldOrb, or you can build a portal from the Nether. The portal is standard 2*3, made from chiseled Blocks of Uranium. Ignited by the Golden Scythe again. Description of individual Star System B worlds are here for you to read.

betterquesting.name: Bricks for Everybody
betterquesting.desc: You don't plan to live in a mud shad right? Get material for a solid brick home and you will get some astonished viewers here.

betterquesting.name: Specialities
betterquesting.desc: Getting more and more tasty.

betterquesting.name: Gas Giant Mining
betterquesting.desc: Drone is ready in your Dockyard? Program it to collect Nitrogen and let it work. When it returns, you can pump the nitrogen out using the Rocket Unloader. If you put it through the bottling machine, you can make the so much needed Nitrogen Tanks.

betterquesting.name: SandMoon Moon
betterquesting.desc:
It orbits the Mystical Gas Giant, so it requiresthe Mystical World Orb

Small deposits of Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Ovium and Basalt.

Large deposites of Iron, Gold, Redstone, Diamonds, Osram, Silver and Coal.

Also Meteorite, Black Quartz, Tiberium, Cobalt, Ardite, Nether Quartz, Soul Sand, Uranium, Uru, Glowstone, Titanium and Prometheum can be found here.

betterquesting.name: Reset the Food Chain
betterquesting.desc: If you liked this quest chain, you can do it once again for just a small fee.

betterquesting.name: Better Factory
betterquesting.desc: You can also improve your factory now.

betterquesting.name: Food
betterquesting.desc: Soup? Sui vous plait?

betterquesting.name: First Tanks
betterquesting.desc: Liquids must be stored somewhere. Well, you are far enough to be able to do just that. Water Barrels and Seared Tanks are your solution for now.

betterquesting.name: Bees and Apples
betterquesting.desc: As usual, here are some little tasks to amuse our audience. In this case, you must have really strange ship with bees and apple trees.

betterquesting.name: Zealous Fisher
betterquesting.desc: Do you like fishing? A lot?

betterquesting.name: HomeWorld Gas Giant
betterquesting.desc:
It requires the Home World Orb

Well it is a Gas Giant so you don't mine any minerals here, but it is a good source of Oxygen, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Cloud Seed, Nutrient Destilation and Hootch.

betterquesting.name: Machine to make Machines
betterquesting.desc: As usual, the first thing to make is something what can make making other things easier. In this case, let's build Carpenter, Thermionic Fabricator and first motor to power them up.

betterquesting.name: Dilithium Crystals
betterquesting.desc: Now, the basic ore has to be purified to get the real dilithium crystals, so you better start soon.

betterquesting.name: Hills Island
betterquesting.desc:
Iron [10-55]
Diamond [5-25]
Emerald[40-130]
Lapis [5-25]

betterquesting.name: Bee Advancement
betterquesting.desc: With new materials, you may be able to produce Industrial Apiaries and some Bee Mutation equipment like Mutatron and Mutagen Producer.

betterquesting.name: Gadgets
betterquesting.desc: Basic and usefull utilities like Battery, Magnet and Leafblower are totally within your reach now.

betterquesting.name: Under End
betterquesting.desc:
Maybe you noticed that to get into space, you are missing some End-Ores. Well theEnd is a moon orbiting 4th planet of the Alpha Star so no, you cannot go there yet. But you can go to UnderEnd. That is an End-like dimension deep under the surface of your world. To get there, you must:

1)Unlock the portal by crafting the Faraday Suit
2)Build the portal (standart 2*3) using Reinforced Glass. Hint: You can get soulsand in deeper layers of the Roguelike Dungeon.
3)Light the portal using the Golden Scythe.

betterquesting.name: Toasts
betterquesting.desc: Le's do some slow start

betterquesting.name: Precious Materials
betterquesting.desc: This is the place to buy the shiny little things.

betterquesting.name: Moon
betterquesting.desc:
Moon is your closest and easiest target.

Deposites of Iron, Gold, Redstone, Lapis, Emeralds, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Nickel, Osram, Basalt and Silver.

Also Meteorite and Karmesine.

betterquesting.name: Invoking Ores
betterquesting.desc: Also new way of producing ores is now available. A specialized Ore Lens which changes the Atomic Reconstructor into the powerfull Ore Invoker.

betterquesting.name: Space Cannon
betterquesting.desc: Tired of Rockets, but Space Elevator is too slow? What about a Rail Gun, firing your load directly into the orbit.

betterquesting.name: Superb Capacitor
betterquesting.desc: Even more improved Capacitors are now in your reach.

betterquesting.name: Draconic Generator
betterquesting.desc: Burn the Awakened Draconium? Are you insane?

betterquesting.name: Crops
betterquesting.desc:
Food. The fist part of your journy will be a lot about food. And let me tell you that the time of backpack full of baked potatoes is over.

Well. The food you can pick here is not omnipotent an you wil quickly get sick of eating just one kind. So: make a big variety... I mean it. BIG. The bigger the better chance to survive.

betterquesting.name: Wool and Rope
betterquesting.desc: Now lets start a technological revolution. Shell we? Well... slowly at first. You will definitely need some ropes, cotton, cloth and wool.

betterquesting.name: Mood Music
betterquesting.desc: I almost forgot... you just love bees, right?

betterquesting.name: Emergency Reset
betterquesting.desc: Something went wrong? This should fix it. Normally use the reset on the right.

betterquesting.name: Capacitors
betterquesting.desc: Some basic crystal tech allows you now to build Capacitors... a fast charge/discharge battery.

betterquesting.name: Reset the Miners Chain
betterquesting.desc: If you liked this quest chain, you can do it once again for just a small fee.

betterquesting.name: Unlocking the End
betterquesting.desc: If you will check the Restricted Portals Achievements page, you will find out that before you will be allowed to enter the End, you must craft the Draconium Ingot first. Well go ahead. Do it. After you will have the achievement, to get to the End will be just a question of launching your rocket.

betterquesting.name: Dungeon loot
betterquesting.desc: Some dungeon loot may be of great interrest to you especially the one from deeper levels. Because you cannot find this stuff anywhere else on this planet. Try to look for some Blaze Rods, or NetherWart. Maybe some Endstone?

betterquesting.name: Unlocking the Nether
betterquesting.desc: If you will check the Restricted Portals Achievements page, you will find out that before you will be allowed to enter the Nether, you must craft the Uranium seed first. Well go ahead. Do it. After you will have the achievement, to get to the Nether will be your well known procedure, obsidian frame and light it up.

betterquesting.name: Rocket Gone?
betterquesting.desc:
So you lost your toy-rocket. And now you are crying and you want to give up. Well, I have here million viewers who are telling you:

Please, don't.

They are willing to buy you a new one, if you try once more.

betterquesting.name: Bees and Traps
betterquesting.desc: Next goal is wax and leather. So yes... bees from the beginning. Are you excited? The land and water traps can also supply the so much missing meat for your diet.

betterquesting.name: Almost Teleport
betterquesting.desc: Tired of elevators? Try Traveling Anchors and the Staff of Traveling.

betterquesting.name: Gear Up and Go
betterquesting.desc: Before you can build the portal, you must unlock it first, by crafting the Faraday Suit. Then build the structure of 14 Reinforced Glass making the circle with 2*3 empty doorway in the middle and activate it with the Golden Scythe.

betterquesting.name: Mini Farm
betterquesting.desc: Also Farms should be possible to miniaturize now. Build a Clothe. Read about it in the engineers manual, it is an awesome machine.

betterquesting.name: Charcoal
betterquesting.desc: This is a good alternative to Coal. Also needed for Smeltery later on. To get Charcoal, you will have to use the Forestry way. Make a pyramid out of 20 Loam with 2x2 of WoodPiles inside and ignite it.

betterquesting.name: Spending Victory Points
betterquesting.desc: Of course you can just pile up your victory points and at the end you will have the biggest score of all times. But, what if you could use those points to get some advantage over your competitors? Wait you don't know you have competitors? Well...

betterquesting.name: Mining in the Belt
betterquesting.desc:
There is also another moon orbiting this gas giant. The Belt. Asteroid belt is an unbelievably dangerous place. Unfortunately it is also the only place near by where you can find Ardite and Cobalt. Before you will go there understand this.

It is very hard to land there. Expect that you may loose your rocket and everything on it in your landing attempt. It will simply miss all the asteroids and fall into the void.

So, it is recommended to be able to fly or glide, so you can leave the rocket in case of emergency. And it is also good to have everything you need to build a second rocket in your pocket so you will be able to get out of there. Good trick is to move your launch platform so your next rockets will not be lost or just build a base on the place where you expect to land next time.

betterquesting.name: Hells Furnace
betterquesting.desc: Don't think small, build lava powered furnace early and be cool.

betterquesting.name: CrystalMoon Moon
betterquesting.desc:
This moon is orbiting the AlienWorld Planet, so it has the same World Orb.

Natural Growth of Crystal Block Spires.

Small deposites of Iron, Gold, Redstone, Aluminium, Copper, Tin, Zinc, Lead, Eezo, Ovium and Glowstone.

Large deposites of Lapis, Diamonds, Emeralds, Lead, Nickel, Osram, Meteorite and Karmesine.

betterquesting.name: Advanced Gadgets
betterquesting.desc: Some quite useful gadgets are now available to you, like Experience Rod and Handheld Filler.

betterquesting.name: Asteroids Mining
betterquesting.desc:
You have your first satellite out? Good. It is recommended to have at least 2 Optical, 2 Composition and 2 Mass Satellites in the orbit. Build an Astrobody Data Processor to have a place to collect the data. But what for?

Build an Observatory. At night, when the Observatory will open, scan the sky for asteroids. Make an Asteroid ID chip there. Fill this chip with data in the AD-Processor. Recommended is to have a full 3x1000 data inside.

Now it is time to send a rocket to mine that piece of rock. This rocker must have some serious storage compartment, Guidance Computer with the programmed Asteroid ID chip and some Mining Drills.

betterquesting.name: The Drone
betterquesting.desc: Drone must be built in the Dockyard in the similar manner as the Rocket is on the Launch Pad. When built, It will face away from the Assembler, so put it's Engines as the closest thing to the Assembler. The Drone will first drop down from your Dockyard, then it will ignite it's engines and fly towards it's goal. Each Drone must have Engines, Fuel Tanks, Guidance Computer, Hard Tanks for the collected fluid and Gas Intakes.

betterquesting.name: Ghasts !!!
betterquesting.desc: Advanced Market means also advanced safari.

betterquesting.name: Savanna Islands
betterquesting.desc:
Iron [10-55]
Nickel [30-50]
Eezo [15-40]
Aluminium [40-120]

betterquesting.name: Mining the Alien Planet
betterquesting.desc: Since the Alien Planet is the only source of Iridium in this solar system, you should start a mine also here.

betterquesting.name: Flying
betterquesting.desc: If you are tired of evading piranha, you can try an AirShip instead of the common Ship. What you need for this is a lot of baloons. For that you will need Steam, which means, Fermenter. This simple it is.

betterquesting.name: Silverfish
betterquesting.desc: Where to find silverfish in this universe? Well don't worry, they will find you.

betterquesting.name: Improving power source
betterquesting.desc: With steel, you can actually build a much powerful source of RF. Try Water Wheel, or improved Wind Mill.

betterquesting.name: Bees Again
betterquesting.desc: Maybe bees can have more use then just wax. If you build Centrifuge, you may be process their prducts more reliably.

betterquesting.name: Reset the Chef Chain
betterquesting.desc: If you liked this quest chain, you can do it once again for just a small fee.

betterquesting.name: Space Suit
betterquesting.desc: All jokes aside, Space is Cold. You need a proper suit to survive in it. You can build such suit now. You will also need a Suit Workstation to configure it, Suite Charge Pad to load it with oxygen. Oxygen can be produced in the Electrolyser.

betterquesting.name: Roots
betterquesting.desc: Our viewers want to see you thrive. Deliver some most common seeds to prove you are the master of your land.

betterquesting.name: The Dockyard
betterquesting.desc: Unmanned vehicle Dockyard does not need Launch Pad... what it does need are arms from Structure Tower blocks, which expands from the Assembler to the left, right, up and down, and from the end of the up arm also forward. Those arms shows, how big will be your future Drone.

betterquesting.name: Tree Farm
betterquesting.desc: Tired of chopping down trees? What about an automated tree farm?

betterquesting.name: Age of Casting
betterquesting.desc: Ok, Duranite Ore, the Initial Age is over and new hoarding tasks are here for you. But since this day on... don't expect to keep the items. Next age starts after you receive your first Steel Ingot.

betterquesting.name: Berries
betterquesting.desc: Enough Vegetables, time for some Berries.

betterquesting.name: True Refined Storage
betterquesting.desc: Now you feel confident that you can reproduce all from the Refined Storage realm. Look into Interfaces, Wireless grids and more.

betterquesting.name: Best Power Transfer
betterquesting.desc: You may be able to reach the Draconic Power Crystals... the most ultimate RF transfer technology in the universe.

betterquesting.name: Seeds Again
betterquesting.desc: So you forgot your most important seeds home and you need them now? Lucky for you we have some fresh delivery here.

betterquesting.name: Diesel power
betterquesting.desc: You cannot a rocket ship, using power of wind and water, can you? Well, building a regular diesel generator is the next option for you.

betterquesting.name: Lamps
betterquesting.desc: If you are looking for a good source of light for your space ship, Power Lamps are now available.

betterquesting.name: Laser Transport
betterquesting.desc: Conveyor Belts are fun, but now that you have access to UnderEnd tech, you can start thinking of a more advanced tech. One, which is available to you right now is Laser Transportation technology. You can beam Energy, but also Items and Fluids. To set the beams, you will need Laser Wrench and Compas. Read more about it in the ActuallyAdditions manual.

betterquesting.name: Going Wild
betterquesting.desc: And what about going DEEP under?

betterquesting.name: Farmer
betterquesting.desc: Another improved farming technology is also available now. Try to make a Farmer.

betterquesting.name: Asteroids Scanning
betterquesting.desc:
Back Home again? Good. It is time to focus on your next mission. You need Dilithium and the only good ore for this is scattered on asteroids in the interplanetary space. So your next goal is to launch a series of Satellites equipped with Optical, Composition and Mass sensors.

Build a Satellite Assembly machine. Construct in it a Satellite with an Optical Sensor and some Basic Solar Panels and data chips. Keep the Satellite ID Chip.

Build a rocket which will not have a seat, but a Satellite Bay instead. Put the Satellite into that bay and launch the rocket. For remote launching a rocket, you will need a Rocket Monitoring Station been linked to that rocket.

Build a Satellite Monitoring Station. Put in the Satellite ID chip and watch the data slowly flow in.

betterquesting.name: Moon Metals
betterquesting.desc: So you are on the moon. Good. But why? Right? Well, for one, the Moon is quite rich for nearly all the metals, you were mining on the surface. Second and even more important, there are deposits of Moon Rock, Karmesine and Meteorite. Find those and take them with you if you can. They will be crucial for your next progress.

betterquesting.name: Milk and Eggs
betterquesting.desc: So ok, if you soo insist, you don't have to hunt. But it won't be cheap.

betterquesting.name: Are you Nuts
betterquesting.desc: Now chestnuts.

betterquesting.name: Chemical Reactor
betterquesting.desc: So it is finally here, you can build the Chemical Reactor... the MODERN way to produce the rocket fuel.

betterquesting.name: Up and Down
betterquesting.desc: So I get it, you don't want to bore us by climbing ladders. But do you realize that this is almost enough to build a Space Elevator?

betterquesting.name: Are you Builder?
betterquesting.desc: You must first prove that you are a serious builder. Deliver a chisel tool.

betterquesting.name: Dates for everybody
betterquesting.desc: Supply of dates please.

betterquesting.name: Sauces
betterquesting.desc: Finishing secret is always the sauce.

betterquesting.name: Draconic Energy
betterquesting.desc: New Chapter of Draconic Technologies is now getting into your reach. And what is a better way to open it than with the omniscient Draconic Power Core? And Draconic Energy Crystals?

betterquesting.name: Advanced Circuits
betterquesting.desc: With proper metals, you can now build your first Rocketry Circuits (Controll, Item IO and Liquid IO Circuit Boards). They are expensive and crude, but they work.

betterquesting.name: Entering the Market
betterquesting.desc: Now to the market. Remember, you can buy only one thing.

betterquesting.name: Steel
betterquesting.desc: Most of the heavy machinery needs Steel. Arc Furnace is your entry point for this.

betterquesting.name: Simple Products
betterquesting.desc: Need some Leather? Cloth? Treated Wood? We have some for you.

betterquesting.name: Sheep Hearder
betterquesting.desc: And the gold third way is to hunt your own animals, like sheeps.

betterquesting.name: The Distant World
betterquesting.desc: Want to get to the Beta Star System? Your first destination there is the Distant World. Now, there are two Ways to get there. You can build the Uranium portal from the Nether, Or you can travel with your Warp Ship, if you will have the Distant World Orb.

betterquesting.name: Entering the Market
betterquesting.desc: Now to the market. As usual, you can buy only one thing.

betterquesting.name: Automatic data
betterquesting.desc: Did you know that you can transfer the data from the Sattelite Monitoring Stations using Data Cables? Just apply redstone to the piece which comes out from the Monitoring Station.

betterquesting.name: Wheats
betterquesting.desc: Can your empire be built up without wheet and rice? Certainly not.

betterquesting.name: Leaf Eating Generator
betterquesting.desc: Interesting application in the shape of Generator producing RF from consuming leaves is now opened for you.

betterquesting.name: Roadmap
betterquesting.desc: Overall guide to this pack.

betterquesting.name: Pre-Industrial
betterquesting.desc: From first night to Smeltery. This is your first bunch of guides to follow.

betterquesting.name: Early-Industrial
betterquesting.desc: You cannot build industry without some serious machinery and that cannot be build from sticks and leather. It is time for machines.

betterquesting.name: Unified-Electronics
betterquesting.desc: Next step is heavy machinery. For that you will need some more sophisticated electronics then just electron tubes. It is time for controll circuits.

betterquesting.name: Early Space Age
betterquesting.desc: So you have all the tech. The only thing missing is some serious amount of resources and you can... Walk the Stars. Well, more like tiny steps at the beginning.

betterquesting.name: Beyond the Speed of Light
betterquesting.desc: Some hard tasks stands between you and your first FTL Flight. Visit the infamous Asteroid Belt and with new materials, construct your own Warp Ship.

betterquesting.name: Alpha Star System Planets
betterquesting.desc: What will you discover when you will battle your way through the first Star System?

betterquesting.name: Nether and End
betterquesting.desc: Heaven and Hell lies in between the Alpha and Beta Star Systems. To get to the latter you must visit them both.

betterquesting.name: Beta Star System
betterquesting.desc: You are finally there. But your work is not over yet.

betterquesting.name: Basic Trading
betterquesting.desc: Some players want to be more farmers then explorers and so they can. Here is a whole quest line about making Quisine. If you want to entertain our viewers by cooking. Here is your opportunity.

betterquesting.name: Buying Essentials
betterquesting.desc: Concider this a market, where your seller is the audience. Show them something and if they will be fond of you, they may give you what you will ask for.

betterquesting.name: Buying Space Items
betterquesting.desc: So you have some experience with market... here is advanced market for you Space travelling folk.

betterquesting.name: Hoading for beginners
betterquesting.desc: What would it be if this Questing Modpack had no hoarding quests?

betterquesting.name: Cheats
betterquesting.desc: You should not open this tab unless you feel REALLY REALLY in deep trouble.
